page.title: 04COMMUNICATIONS _ BORTH
page.content: The nearest Library is at Aberystwyth, but Borth is visited by the mobile library van from there every fortnight. Also in Aberystwyth is the National Library of Wales, a copyright library, plus the various college and university libraries. The 'Tincer', a local Welsh newspaper is produced monthly with voluntary labour. The 'Cambrian News', a weekly bilingual paper, covers Ceredigion (the former Cardiganshire). Borth Town Council recently won the battle to retain the Borth telephone exchange.
